description: The JSON schema for the Terminal.Gui Configuration Manager. This schema is published to https://gui-cs.github.io/Terminal.Gui/schemas/tui-config-schema.json.

AlternateForwardKey.description: Alternative key for navigating forwards through views. SCtrl+Tab is the primary key.

AlternateBackwardKey.description: Alternative key for navigating backwards through views. Shift+Ctrl+Tab is the primary key.

QuitKey.description: The key to quit the application. Ctrl+Q is the default.

IsMouseDisabled.description: Disable or enable the mouse. The mouse is enabled by default.

UseSystemConsole.description: If true, forces the use of the System.Console-based (aka NetDriver) driver. The default is false.

VisualStyles.description: Defines the Visual Style settings for Terminal.Gui applications.

ColorSchemes.description: A list of ColorSchemes. Each ColorScheme specifies a set of Attributes (Foreground & Background).

ColorScheme.description: A Terminal.Gui ColorScheme. Specifies the Foreground & Background colors for modes of an Terminal.Gui app.

Normal.description: The foreground and background color for text when the view is not focused, hot, or disabled.

Focus.description: The foreground and background color for text when the view has focus.

HotNormal.description: The foreground and background color for text when the view is highlighted (hot).

HotFocus.description: The foreground and background color for text when the view is highlighted (hot) and has focus.

Disabled.description: The foreground and background color for text when the view disabled.

Attribute.description: A Terminal.Gui color attribute. Specifies the Foreground & Background colors for Terminal.Gui output.

Color.description: One be either one of 16 standard color names or an rgb(r,g,b) tuple.
